roleset.name: to avoid, keep away from
roleset.note: SHUN-V NOTES: Member of Vncls avoid-52. (from shun.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: In many other institutions , scientists are shunning contacts with venture investors until the NIH policy is settled [*-1] .
example.arg: until the NIH policy is settled [*-1]

example.name: another transitive
example.text: Investors-2 , he advises [0] [*T*-1], `` should be cautious , '' [*-2] holding fewer stocks than usual and also shunning bonds .
